alert.note: Alert for Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 18 at 3:38AM EDT until April 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches before changeover to rain. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elevations at or above 1500 feet in western Franklin MA County. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates could exceed an inch per hour at times, mainly at or above 1500 feet. While snow should accumulate mainly on grassy surfaces, the combination of the snow falling overnight and intense rates could lead to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
